verses.text:
God is our Song, and every singer blest
Who praising Him finds energy and rest.
All who praise God with unaffected joy
Give back to us the wisdom we destroy.

God is our Song, for Jesus comes to save;
While praising Him we offer all we have.
New songs we sing, in vented new of sound
When God builds up on a again the voice of ground.

This is the Song no conflict ever drowns;
Who praises God our human wrath disowns.
Love knows what rich complex is God or sorrow stills the tongue.
Glorious the faith which si-lent-ly obeys

God is our Si-lence when no songs are sung,
When ce-sta-Him finds en-er-gy and rest.
Un-til we find a again the voice of praise.
